metadata.name: Named Pipe Created Via Mkfifo
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a new named pipe using the "mkfifo" utility

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/mkfifo')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a new named pipe using the "mkfifo" utility
